0.text: Innate: Miss Fortune's basic attacks apply a mark that expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 50% − 100% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage, halved to 25% − 50% (based on level) AD against  minions.

metaData.0: TARGET RANGE:  MISS FORTUNE'S  ATTACK RANGE

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage, which then bounces to hit another enemy behind them. The shot applies on-attack effects to the first enemy hit, as well as  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to both enemies hit.

1.text: Double Up's bounce is affected by  critical strike modifiers. If Double Up kills the primary target, the bounce is guaranteed to  critically strike.

2.text: Double Up's bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target. The target does not have to be  visible for the shot to bounce to them.

0.text: Passive: Miss Fortune gains  25 bonus movement speed after 5 seconds without taking non- persistent damage. This bonus is increased after another 5 seconds, and is granted instantly whenever Strut is cast or upon respawning.

1.text: Active: Miss Fortune gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

2.text: Marking a new target with  Love Tap reduces Strut's  cooldown by 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune casts a storm of bullets at the target location that grants  sight of the area for 2 seconds, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies within every 0.25 seconds.

1.text: Make It Rain will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Miss Fortune  channels for up to 3 seconds, firing several waves of bullets in a spread of 6 projectiles per wave in the target direction, with each wave dealing 75% AD (+ 20% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Each wave can  critically strike for (20% +  7%) bonus physical damage.

0.text: Innate: Miss Fortune's basic attacks apply a mark that expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 50% − 100% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage, halved to 25% − 50% (based on level) AD against  minions.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+240 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)
+7% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 /  16) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  750

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Active: Miss Fortune casts a storm of bullets at the target location that grants  sight of the area for 2 seconds, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies within every 0.25 seconds.
Active: Miss Fortune casts a storm of bullets at the target location that grants  sight of the area for 2 seconds, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies within every 0.25 seconds.

Active: Miss Fortune  channels for up to 3 seconds, firing several waves of bullets in a spread of 6 projectiles per wave in the target direction, with each wave dealing 75% AD (+ 20% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

Active: Miss Fortune  channels for up to 3 seconds, firing several waves of bullets in a spread of 6 projectiles per wave in the target direction, with each wave dealing 75% AD (+ 20% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

Active: Miss Fortune  channels for up to 3 seconds, firing several waves of bullets in a spread of 6 projectiles per wave in the target direction, with each wave dealing 75% AD (+ 20% AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

Active: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage, which then bounces to hit another enemy behind them. The shot applies on-attack effects to the first enemy hit, as well as  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to both enemies hit.

0.origin: TARGET RANGE:  MISS FORTUNE'S  ATTACK RANGE
